text: Start with a micro-crimp match and a high left foot stab.

Micro-adjust fingers before the final match to avoid slipping.
Classic Yosemite mantle start; press down hard to rock over.
Big dyno to the lightning bolt hold, control the swing with a right heel hook.
Gaston right hand and slowly slap up slopers to maintain balance.
Delicate topout requires pressing into the final sloper with body tension.

Left-hand lock-off before bumping to the small gaston.
Final move is a lunging right-hand reach to a jug.

Press hard on the right toe to avoid cutting loose mid-move.

Crux move requires a delicate deadpoint catch with full body engagement.
Lock off on micro-crimps before making the big reach to the next edge.
Precise foot placement is crucial to avoid barn-dooring.

Maintain heel-toe cam through the roof section to avoid cutting loose.
